text: + One of the oldest ways of rendering content. » The server will generate the full HTML page and return this as the response. » Data from a database or external APl may be included in the page generated. The db connection / API fetch are handled on the server. » No rendering is required on the client. » Every request is handled independently and the server will generate a new response each time » The server processing power is shared by all active users at a given time.
